Title: Build new socialist rural villages
Designer: Wu Shaoyun (吴少云)Wang Liuying (王柳影)Sun Zhiyin (孙志殷)Wu Zhefu (吴哲夫)Xin Liliang (忻礼良)Xu Jiping (徐寄萍)Zhang Yuqing (章育青)Lu Zezhi (陆泽之)Huang Shansai (黃善賽)Huang Zixi (黄子希)
Publisher: Shanghai guopian chubanshe (上海国片出版社)
Notes: The building in the centre is the "Happiness Township Club" (幸福乡俱乐部). A "Bumper Harvest model worker" is being sent off by car, with firecrackers and a festive parade, to attend the National People's Congress. The car looks very much like a Shanghai Phoenix (凤凰 - Fenghuang), one of the first cars produced in China.This poster is from the seventh impression, September 1958 (print run 430.001-710.000).
